namudu, thama piya parshawayen thamanta himiwannata niyamitha me aithihasika udalu rajaya mage putha wisin mage munupurekutada mathu dinayaka uruma kara dena bawata mata kisi sakayak natha.me aruma puduma udalla kawuthukagaraye thiyannata pawa sudusu aithihasika udallak bawa ma mulinma kiwwe ee nisaya.-kathandarakarayapa/li:metharam kalak me udalla pawathimata hethuwa nam mage siya da, thaththa da, ma da me paramparika wasthuwa manawa nadaththukaramin raka balaganimayi.mage siya me udalle thalaya gewena hamawarakama aluth ma aluth kimbaula lakuna darana udalu thalayak yoda udalle nadaththu katayuthu kaleya.

chandana bandaraloka pujitha kià·Šrakat kià·Šradaka muththayiya muralidaran wenuwen parlimenthuwe di pawathi upahara pidime uthsawaya demala jathika sandhanaye manthià·Šrawaru warjanaya kalaha.kià·Šrakat wansha kathawe nawa warthawak thabu muththayiya muralidaranta saha 1996 wasare loka kusalanaya meratata gena aa kià·Šrakat kià·Šradakayanta saha 2007 wasare loka kià·Šrakat anushurathawa gena aa shià·Šra lanka kià·Šrakat kandayamata suba pathimata kathanayaka wi.ja.mu. lokubandara mahatha me uthsawaya sanwidhanaya kara thibuni.agamathi rathnasiri wikaà·Šramanayakawipaksha nayaka ranil wikaà·Šramasinha, jawipe manthià·Šra wimal wirawansha mahathwaru murali paà·Šramukha kià·Šrakat kià·Šradakayan agayimata lak kalaha.murali wenuwen sanwidhanaya kara thibu me uthsawaya demala jathika sandhanaya warjanaya kirima kageth dosha darshanayata lakwiya.murali agayamin parlimenthuwa amathu ekama demala manthià·Šrawaraya wuye jawipe manthià·Šra ramalingam chandrasekaran pamani.
